name: HYDROGEN ASEAN 2022 CONFERENCE
content: The hosting of the HYDROGEN ASEAN 2022 Summit and Exhibition is timely as it provides an international stage for the Southeast-Asian countries to transition towards a hydrogen economy future. The Summit is structured to gather policymakers, industrial captains, clean mobility actors, power producers, carbon capture and storage experts, hydrogen producers and green technology providers including funding agencies to deliberate on policies and establish strategies to unlock new opportunities in the hydrogen economy. The Summit will also look into new hydrogen applications in the power, transportation, mining and industrial sectors.
